thread.title: Rameez Raja keen to cast Katrina Kaif and Mahira Khan in his film!
thread.title_full: Rameez Raja keen to cast Katrina Kaif and Mahira Khan in his film! - Sports

author: Agencies
title: Rameez Raja keen to cast Katrina Kaif and Mahira Khan in his film!
text:
Rameez Raja 
Former Pakistani cricketer-turned-commentator Rameez Raja is reportedly planning to make a film to showcase how sports like cricket can be used to eliminate terrorism.
He's even picked his lead actor for it —Bollywood superstar Sanjay Dutt. However, he's in a bit of a dilemma as far casting the leading lady is concerned.
Mahira Khan 
In an interview on Pakistan TV channel Geo News, Rameez said he's impressed by both Pakistani actress Mahira Khan of Raees fame, and Bollywood star Katrina Kaif.
Katrina Kaif 
“It's a soft film and has action, emotions and of course, cricket. Actresses like Mahira Khan and Katrina Kaif have immense talent. It is my wish to cast them in the movie,” said Rameez.
